name: Source Discipline
prompt: Only use the selected sources. If not found in sources, say "Not found in sources."
prompt_tr: Sadece seçili kaynakları kullan. Kaynakta yoksa "Kaynaklarda geçmiyor" de.

name: Evidence Format
prompt: Add clickable citation for every important claim; quote the relevant sentence briefly (≤ 20 words) when possible.
prompt_tr: Her önemli iddia için tıklanabilir alıntı/citation ekle; mümkünse ilgili cümleyi kısa alıntıla (≤ 20 kelime).

name: Uncertainty Management
prompt: Mark uncertain points as bullet items labeled "Uncertain/Assumption".
prompt_tr: Emin olmadığın noktaları madde madde "Belirsiz/Varsayım" diye işaretle.

name: Output Standard
prompt: Structure the answer as: (1) Brief summary, (2) Details, (3) Source-based citations table.
prompt_tr: Cevabı: (1) Kısa özet, (2) Detay, (3) Kaynaklara dayalı alıntılar tablosu şeklinde ver.

name: Executive Summary
prompt: Extract an executive summary of no more than 8 bullet points from these sources. Add citation to each.
prompt_tr: Bu kaynaklardan 8 maddeyi geçmeyen bir yönetici özeti çıkar. Her maddeye citation ekle.

name: TL;DR + Critical Details
prompt: First a 5-line TL;DR, then 'Critical details' (max 10 items). Each item with citation.
prompt_tr: Önce 5 satırlık TL;DR, sonra 'Kritik detaylar' (en fazla 10 madde). Her madde citation'lı.

name: Concept Framework
prompt: Map the topic as: (a) Definitions, (b) Main theses, (c) Evidence, (d) Counterarguments.
prompt_tr: Konuyu (a) Tanımlar, (b) Ana tezler, (c) Kanıtlar, (d) Karşı argümanlar şeklinde şemala.

name: "What Changed?" Summary
prompt: What changed compared to the previous approach? Create a 'Change → Impact → Evidence' table.
prompt_tr: Bu dokümanda önceki yaklaşıma göre neler değişmiş? 'Değişiklik → Etki → Kanıt' tablosu yap.

name: Specific Section Summary
prompt: Only summarize the 'Results/Findings' and 'Discussion' sections; skip the rest.
prompt_tr: Yalnızca 'Results/Findings' ve 'Discussion' kısımlarını özetle; geri kalanı es geç.

name: One-Page Study Note
prompt: Prepare a one-page A4 study summary from these sources: headings + brief explanations + examples.
prompt_tr: Bu kaynaklardan A4 tek sayfalık ders özeti hazırla: başlıklar + kısa açıklamalar + örnekler.

name: Active Recall Questions
prompt: 20 active-recall questions (easy→hard). Add answer key at the bottom; each answer with citation.
prompt_tr: 20 adet aktif-hatırlama sorusu üret (kolay→zor). Cevap anahtarını en alta ekle; her cevaba citation.

name: Flashcard Generator
prompt: 30 flashcards: Front 'Question/Concept', back 'Short answer + 1 example + citation'.
prompt_tr: 30 flashcard üret: Ön yüz 'Soru/Kavram', arka yüz 'Kısa cevap + 1 örnek + citation'.

name: Misconception Hunter
prompt: Extract 10 common student misconceptions; provide correct explanation backed by sources for each.
prompt_tr: Bu konuda öğrencilerin yaptığı 10 yaygın hatayı çıkar; her biri için doğru açıklamayı kaynakla destekle.

name: Feynman Test
prompt: Simplify the topic as if explaining to a 12-year-old; then re-explain at university level.
prompt_tr: Konuyu 12 yaşındaki birine anlatır gibi sadeleştir; sonra aynı içeriği üniversite düzeyinde tekrar anlat.

name: Consensus / Conflict / Gap
prompt: Extract points where sources (a) agree, (b) conflict, (c) leave gaps. Each with citation.
prompt_tr: Kaynakların (a) üzerinde uzlaştığı, (b) çeliştiği, (c) eksik bıraktığı noktaları çıkar. Her madde citation'lı.

name: Claim–Evidence Matrix
prompt: Each row a 'claim': Claim | Evidence (short quote) | Source/citation | Strength (weak/medium/strong).
prompt_tr: Her satır bir 'iddia' olsun: İddia | Kanıt (kısa alıntı) | Kaynak/citation | Güç (zayıf/orta/güçlü).

name: Research Question Refinement
prompt: Rewrite my research question in 3 alternatives based on sources: narrow, medium, broad scope.
prompt_tr: Bu kaynaklara göre araştırma sorumu 3 alternatifle yeniden yaz: dar, orta, geniş kapsam.

name: Methodology Comparison
prompt: Compare study methodologies: sample, measurement, limitations, bias risks.
prompt_tr: Çalışmaların yöntemlerini karşılaştır: örneklem, ölçüm, sınırlılıklar, bias riskleri.

name: Citable Paragraph
prompt: Write 1 'background' paragraph (academic tone) based on sources; add citation at end of sentences.
prompt_tr: Bu kaynaklara dayanarak (akademik ton) 1 paragraf 'background' yaz; cümle sonlarında citation ver.

name: Article Outline
prompt: Create an article/report outline: Intro–Method–Findings–Discussion–Conclusion; bullets + citation under each.
prompt_tr: Şu başlıkla bir makale/rapor iskeleti çıkar: Giriş–Yöntem–Bulgular–Tartışma–Sonuç; her bölüm altına bullet'lar + citation.

name: Argument Strengthening
prompt: Extract 5 supporting evidence and 3 counterarguments for this thesis; each with citation.
prompt_tr: Bu tezi destekleyen 5 kanıt ve 3 karşı argüman çıkar; her biri citation'lı.

name: Tone Transformation
prompt: Reframe the same content for: (a) technical team, (b) management, (c) customer.
prompt_tr: Aynı içeriği (a) teknik ekip, (b) yönetim, (c) müşteri için ayrı ayrı yeniden çerçevele.

name: Action Items
prompt: Extract decisions and action items: Action | Owner | Date | Risk | Citation.
prompt_tr: Kararları ve aksiyon maddelerini çıkar: Aksiyon | Sorumlu | Tarih | Risk | Citation.

name: Risk Register
prompt: List project risks: Risk | Probability | Impact | Mitigation | Evidence/citation.
prompt_tr: Bu kaynaklara göre proje risklerini listele: Risk | Olasılık | Etki | Azaltım | Kanıt/citation.

name: Requirements Extraction
prompt: Classify business requirements as 'Must/Should/Could'; each with citation.
prompt_tr: İş gereksinimlerini 'Must/Should/Could' olarak sınıflandır; her madde citation.

name: Single Source Filter
prompt: Answer using only the 'X.pdf' source.
prompt_tr: Yalnızca 'X.pdf' kaynağını kullanarak cevapla.

name: Multi Source Selection
prompt: Use only 'Policy.docx' + 'Appendix A' sources; ignore others.
prompt_tr: Sadece 'Policy.docx' + 'Appendix A' kaynaklarını seç; diğerlerini kullanma.

name: Source Limitation
prompt: Use at most 3 sources and explain why you chose them.
prompt_tr: Bu soruyu yanıtlarken en fazla 3 kaynak kullan ve neden onları seçtiğini söyle.

name: Expert Level Deep Dive
prompt: I already know the basics. Deeply explain the assumptions in X and weaknesses in Y.
prompt_tr: Bu konunun temellerini biliyorum. X kısmındaki varsayımları ve Y kısmındaki zayıf noktaları derinlemesine açıkla.

name: Exam Mode
prompt: Summarize by X, Y, Z headings; generate 3 'potential exam questions' after each.
prompt_tr: X, Y, Z başlıklarına göre özetle; her başlık sonunda 3 tane 'çıkabilir soru' üret.

name: Beginner Mode
prompt: Explain from scratch: first a glossary, then 3 simple examples, then common mistakes.
prompt_tr: Sıfırdan anlat: önce terimler sözlüğü, sonra 3 basit örnek, sonra yaygın hatalar.

name: Critical Evaluation
prompt: Evaluate the argument: clarity, evidence quality, gaps, suggested improvements.
prompt_tr: Yazının argümanını değerlendir: netlik, kanıt kalitesi, eksikler, önerilen iyileştirmeler.

name: Debate
prompt: Build both sides strongly: 5 'for' arguments, 5 'against'; then suggest compromise.
prompt_tr: İki tarafı da güçlü kur: 'lehinde' 5 argüman, 'aleyhinde' 5 argüman; sonra uzlaşma öner.

name: Executive Presentation
prompt: Target: C-level. 8 slides. Problem → Impact → Solution → Risk → Roadmap. Minimal text, clear message.
prompt_tr: Hedef kitle: C-level. 8 slayt. Problem → Etki → Çözüm → Risk → Yol haritası. Az metin, net mesaj.

name: Educational Presentation
prompt: Target: beginners. Step-by-step process. 1 example scenario per section.
prompt_tr: Hedef: yeni başlayanlar. Adım adım süreç anlatımı. Her bölümde 1 örnek senaryo.

name: Technical Design Presentation
prompt: Target: engineering team. Architecture, data flow, trade-offs, open questions, next steps.
prompt_tr: Hedef: mühendis ekibi. Mimari, veri akışı, trade-off'lar, açık sorular, next steps.

name: Reliable Source Suggestion
prompt: Suggest 8 most reliable web sources for this research question: balanced academic + official + industry reports.
prompt_tr: Şu araştırma sorusu için webden en güvenilir 8 kaynak öner: akademik + resmi kurum + sektör raporu dengeli olsun.

name: Recent Source Filter
prompt: Target only post-2023 publications; filter out marketing blogs.
prompt_tr: Sadece 2023 sonrası yayınları hedefle; pazarlama bloglarını ele.

name: Source Evaluation
prompt: Before adding sources, for each: what it covers, why reliable, which question it answers?
prompt_tr: Kaynakları eklemeden önce her biri için: ne anlatıyor, neden güvenilir, hangi soruma cevap olur?

name: Universal Prompt Template
prompt:
PURPOSE: …
SCOPE: (selected sources only / only these files: …)
OUTPUT: (bullets / table / outline / Q&A / flashcard)
EVIDENCE: Each claim with citation; if not in sources say "not in sources".
CONSTRAINT: (length, level, language, tone)
prompt_tr:
AMAÇ: …
KAPSAM: (yalnızca seçili kaynaklar / yalnızca şu dosyalar: …)
ÇIKTI: (madde / tablo / outline / Q&A / flashcard)
KANIT: Her iddia citation'lı; kaynakta yoksa "kaynaklarda yok" de.
KISIT: (uzunluk, seviye, dil, ton)

name: Artificial Intelligence — Trend Scan
prompt: Aggregate Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow posts on Artificial Intelligence. Extract top 10 recurring trends in the last 12 months with example quotes/citations.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka konusunda Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow paylasimlarini derle. Son 12 ayin en cok tekrar eden 10 trendini cikar ve her trend icin ornek alinti/citation ver.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Pain Points
prompt: Collect user complaints about Artificial Intelligence from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Rank pain points by impact and recurrence.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka ile ilgili kullanici sikayetlerini Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow kaynaklarindan topla. Sorunlari etki-buyukluk ve tekrar sayisina gore sirala.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Community FAQ
prompt: Create a 25-question FAQ for Artificial Intelligence from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Add concise answers and source references.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka icin Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow uzerinden 25 soruluk bir SSS listesi olustur. Her soruya kisa cevap ve kaynak referansi ekle.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Myths vs Facts
prompt: Identify common misconceptions around Artificial Intelligence. Build a "Myth -> Fact" table using evidence from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka konusunda toplulukta dolasan yanlis inanislari belirle. Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow delilleriyle "Mit -> Gercek" tablosu yap.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Beginner Guide
prompt: Write a step-by-step beginner guide for Artificial Intelligence. Include practical tips from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka icin yeni baslayanlara yonelik adim adim rehber yaz. Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdan gelen pratik ipuclarini dahil et.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Advanced Patterns
prompt: Extract advanced techniques used by experts in Artificial Intelligence from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Include "when to use / risks".
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka konusunda uzmanlarin kullandigi ileri teknikleri Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdan cikar. "Ne zaman kullanilir / riskleri" ile sun.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Tool Comparison
prompt: Compare the most discussed tools in Artificial Intelligence using Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow data. Provide pros/cons and use cases.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka alaninda en cok karsilastirilan araclari Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow verileriyle karsilastir. Arti-eksi ve kullanim senaryosu yaz.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Career Skills
prompt: Extract interview-relevant skills for Artificial Intelligence from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow discussions. Create a 90-day learning plan.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka icin is gorusmelerinde sorulan becerileri Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow tartismalarindan cikar. 90 gunluk gelisim plani olustur.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Debug Playbook
prompt: Combine Stack Overflow fixes with Reddit/X experiences to write a debug playbook for common Artificial Intelligence issues.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka ile ilgili en yaygin hatalar icin Stack Overflow cozumlerini ve Reddit/X deneyimlerini birlestirerek bir debug playbook yaz.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Decision Framework
prompt: Build a "context -> options -> criteria -> decision" framework for Artificial Intelligence choices with quotes from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka secimlerinde karar vermek icin "baglam -> secenek -> kriter -> karar" cercevesi olustur; Reddit, X, Stack Overflowdan alintilar ekle.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Anti-Pattern Hunter
prompt: Identify frequently seen anti-patterns in Artificial Intelligence communities. Provide better alternatives and source evidence for each.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka konusunda toplulukta sik gorulen anti-patternleri tespit et. Her anti-pattern icin daha iyi alternatif ve kaynak kaniti ver.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Implementation Checklist
prompt: Create an implementation checklist for a Artificial Intelligence project. Prioritize items based on real issues from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka projesi icin uygulama kontrol listesi olustur. Maddeleri Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdan gelen gercek sorunlara gore onceliklendir.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Community Risk Register
prompt: Compile risks encountered in Artificial Intelligence implementations from community sources. Build a risk/likelihood/impact/mitigation table.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka uygulamalarinda karsilasilan riskleri topluluk kaynaklarindan derle. Risk, olasilik, etki ve azaltim tablosu olustur.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Cost-Performance Analysis
prompt: Analyze cost-performance trade-offs of Artificial Intelligence solutions based on Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow discussions.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka cozumlerinde maliyet ve performans dengesini Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow yorumlarina dayanarak analiz et.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Security Review
prompt: Extract security pitfalls and bad practices for Artificial Intelligence from community sources. Provide mitigations sorted by impact.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka ile ilgili guvenlik aciklari ve kotu pratikleri topluluk kaynaklarindan cikar. Onlem listesini etki sirasina gore ver.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Community Benchmark Summary
prompt: Collect benchmark posts about Artificial Intelligence from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Summarize results with methodology differences.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka hakkindaki benchmark paylasimlarini Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow uzerinden topla. Sonuclari metodoloji farklariyla birlikte ozetle.

name: Artificial Intelligence — 90-Day Roadmap
prompt: Create a community-informed 90-day execution roadmap for Artificial Intelligence: weekly goals, outputs, risks, and metrics.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka icin topluluk bilgisine dayali 90 gunluk uygulama yol haritasi cikar: hafta hafta hedef, cikti, risk, olcum metrigi.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Debate Map
prompt: Map disagreements about Artificial Intelligence across Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow: pros, cons, and compromise points.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka konusunda Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdaki gorus ayriliklarini haritala: lehinde, aleyhinde, uzlasi noktasi.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Resource Pack
prompt: Prepare a 20-resource learning pack for Artificial Intelligence based on top community recommendations. Explain why each resource matters.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka ogrenimi icin topluluk tarafindan en cok onerilen 20 kaynaklik bir paket hazirla. Her kaynak icin neden onemli oldugunu acikla.

name: Artificial Intelligence — Action Summary
prompt: Summarize Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow research on Artificial Intelligence into "what to do now": provide 10 concrete action items.
prompt_tr: Yapay Zeka konusunda Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow arastirmasini "simdi ne yapmali?" odakli ozetle: 10 net aksiyon maddesi ver.

name: Climate Technology — Pain Points

name: Climate Technology — Community FAQ

name: Climate Technology — Myths vs Facts

name: Climate Technology — Beginner Guide

name: Climate Technology — Advanced Patterns

name: Climate Technology — Tool Comparison

prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi konusunda Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow paylasimlarini derle. Son 12 ayin en cok tekrar eden 10 trendini cikar ve her trend icin ornek alinti/citation ver.

name: Community Management — Pain Points
prompt: Collect user complaints about Community Management from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Rank pain points by impact and recurrence.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi ile ilgili kullanici sikayetlerini Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow kaynaklarindan topla. Sorunlari etki-buyukluk ve tekrar sayisina gore sirala.

name: Community Management — Community FAQ
prompt: Create a 25-question FAQ for Community Management from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Add concise answers and source references.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi icin Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow uzerinden 25 soruluk bir SSS listesi olustur. Her soruya kisa cevap ve kaynak referansi ekle.

name: Community Management — Myths vs Facts
prompt: Identify common misconceptions around Community Management. Build a "Myth -> Fact" table using evidence from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi konusunda toplulukta dolasan yanlis inanislari belirle. Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow delilleriyle "Mit -> Gercek" tablosu yap.

name: Community Management — Beginner Guide
prompt: Write a step-by-step beginner guide for Community Management. Include practical tips from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi icin yeni baslayanlara yonelik adim adim rehber yaz. Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdan gelen pratik ipuclarini dahil et.

name: Community Management — Advanced Patterns
prompt: Extract advanced techniques used by experts in Community Management from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Include "when to use / risks".
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi konusunda uzmanlarin kullandigi ileri teknikleri Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdan cikar. "Ne zaman kullanilir / riskleri" ile sun.

name: Community Management — Tool Comparison
prompt: Compare the most discussed tools in Community Management using Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow data. Provide pros/cons and use cases.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi alaninda en cok karsilastirilan araclari Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow verileriyle karsilastir. Arti-eksi ve kullanim senaryosu yaz.

name: Community Management — Career Skills
prompt: Extract interview-relevant skills for Community Management from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow discussions. Create a 90-day learning plan.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi icin is gorusmelerinde sorulan becerileri Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow tartismalarindan cikar. 90 gunluk gelisim plani olustur.

name: Community Management — Debug Playbook
prompt: Combine Stack Overflow fixes with Reddit/X experiences to write a debug playbook for common Community Management issues.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi ile ilgili en yaygin hatalar icin Stack Overflow cozumlerini ve Reddit/X deneyimlerini birlestirerek bir debug playbook yaz.

name: Community Management — Decision Framework
prompt: Build a "context -> options -> criteria -> decision" framework for Community Management choices with quotes from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi secimlerinde karar vermek icin "baglam -> secenek -> kriter -> karar" cercevesi olustur; Reddit, X, Stack Overflowdan alintilar ekle.

name: Community Management — Anti-Pattern Hunter
prompt: Identify frequently seen anti-patterns in Community Management communities. Provide better alternatives and source evidence for each.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi konusunda toplulukta sik gorulen anti-patternleri tespit et. Her anti-pattern icin daha iyi alternatif ve kaynak kaniti ver.

name: Community Management — Implementation Checklist
prompt: Create an implementation checklist for a Community Management project. Prioritize items based on real issues from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi projesi icin uygulama kontrol listesi olustur. Maddeleri Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdan gelen gercek sorunlara gore onceliklendir.

name: Community Management — Community Risk Register
prompt: Compile risks encountered in Community Management implementations from community sources. Build a risk/likelihood/impact/mitigation table.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi uygulamalarinda karsilasilan riskleri topluluk kaynaklarindan derle. Risk, olasilik, etki ve azaltim tablosu olustur.

name: Community Management — Cost-Performance Analysis
prompt: Analyze cost-performance trade-offs of Community Management solutions based on Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow discussions.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi cozumlerinde maliyet ve performans dengesini Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow yorumlarina dayanarak analiz et.

name: Community Management — Security Review
prompt: Extract security pitfalls and bad practices for Community Management from community sources. Provide mitigations sorted by impact.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi ile ilgili guvenlik aciklari ve kotu pratikleri topluluk kaynaklarindan cikar. Onlem listesini etki sirasina gore ver.

name: Community Management — Community Benchmark Summary
prompt: Collect benchmark posts about Community Management from Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow. Summarize results with methodology differences.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi hakkindaki benchmark paylasimlarini Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow uzerinden topla. Sonuclari metodoloji farklariyla birlikte ozetle.

name: Community Management — 90-Day Roadmap
prompt: Create a community-informed 90-day execution roadmap for Community Management: weekly goals, outputs, risks, and metrics.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi icin topluluk bilgisine dayali 90 gunluk uygulama yol haritasi cikar: hafta hafta hedef, cikti, risk, olcum metrigi.

name: Community Management — Debate Map
prompt: Map disagreements about Community Management across Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow: pros, cons, and compromise points.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi konusunda Reddit, X ve Stack Overflowdaki gorus ayriliklarini haritala: lehinde, aleyhinde, uzlasi noktasi.

name: Community Management — Resource Pack
prompt: Prepare a 20-resource learning pack for Community Management based on top community recommendations. Explain why each resource matters.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi ogrenimi icin topluluk tarafindan en cok onerilen 20 kaynaklik bir paket hazirla. Her kaynak icin neden onemli oldugunu acikla.

name: Community Management — Action Summary
prompt: Summarize Reddit, X, and Stack Overflow research on Community Management into "what to do now": provide 10 concrete action items.
prompt_tr: Topluluk Yonetimi konusunda Reddit, X ve Stack Overflow arastirmasini "simdi ne yapmali?" odakli ozetle: 10 net aksiyon maddesi ver.
